description.value: You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Field of Life] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tangling Creepers] as 6th-rank primal innate spells once per day each.
